pages.text: sihamte ki bisaye parasparae sodha-poca karai ache
mahasambadatora bisaye
yi bisaye sihamte matanaikya karaiche
Ketiya'o nahaya, sihamte atisighrae'i janibalai paba
Tarapichata, ketiya'o nahaya, sihamte atisighrae'i janibalai paba
Ami prthiraikhanaka sayya banoraa na'ine
arau parbatasamuhaka peraeka
arau ami tomalokaka srsti karaicho yoraa-yoraa
Arau tomalokara topanika karaicho bisraama
Arau raatika karai dicho ararana
Arau dinaka karai dicho jiraika uparjanara samaya
Arau ami tomalokara oparata nirmana karaicho sudrrha satakhana akasa
Arau ami srsti karaicho eti ujjala pradipa
Arau ami barsana karaicho meghamalara paraa pracura pani
Yate tara dbaraa ami utpanna karaiba parao sasya arau udbhida
Arau ghana sannibista udyana
Niscaya nirdharaita ache bicarara dina
Se'i dina sinata phum diya ha’ba tetiya tomaloke dale dale ahiba
Arau akasakhana khuli diya ha’ba, phalata i ha’ba bahu duraarabisista
Arau parbatasamuhaka calita karaa ha’ba, phalata se'ibora hai yaba balimaya maraicikara darae
Niscaya jahannama khapa pati raai ache
Simalanghanakarai sakalara babe pratyarartanasthala
Tata sihamte yuga yuga dharai arasthana karaiba
Tata sihamte sitalata ba upayukta pani'o bhoga karaiba noraaraiba
Utala pani arau durgandhamaya pumjara bahirae
E'itorae'i upayukta pratiphala
Niscaya sihamte ketiya'o hicaba-nikacara asa karaa nachila
Arau sihamte amara nidarsanaralika kathorabharae mithyaraopa karaichila
Arau ami pratito bastu likhitabharae samraksana karai raakhicho
Eteke bhoga karaa, ami tomalokara babe sastira bahirae ana eko brd'dhi nakarao
